```{r}
N <- 100
Y <- rnorm(n=N, mean=1.6, sd=0.2)
hist(Y)
```

# Compile the model
```{r}
library(rstan)
```

```{r}
parallel::detectCores()
```


```{r}
model <- stan_model('first_model.stan')
```

```{r}
fit <- sampling(model, list(N=N, Y=Y), iter=200, chain=4)
```

```{r}
print(fit)
```

```{r}
params <- extract(fit)
```

```{r}
hist(params$mu)
```

```{r}
hist(params$sigma)
```

```{r}
library(shinystan)
```

```{r}
launch_shinystan(fit)
```
